mapper.sql: id, business_party_id AS businessPartyId, bpmn_conf_id AS bpmnConfId, bpm_conf_callback_url AS bpmConfCallbackUrl, bpm_flow_callback_url AS bpmFlowCallbackUrl, status, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_user_name AS createUserName, create_user_uuid AS createUserUuid, remark, is_del AS isDel, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime
